a_flashband.name: Flashband
a_flashband.shortDescription: The Flashband website helps musicians meet, network and play music with other people in their area.
a_flashband.longDescription: Flashband is an organization that helps musicians meet, network and play music. In addition to being a co-founder of the project, I am also its lead designer and front-end developer.
a_flashband.longDescriptionTwo: Since its inception in 2012, Flashband has grown from a few friends using google docs to organize jam sessions to a fully fledged social-media platform. The website helps musicians find and communicate with others in addition to helping them participate in our popular Showcases throughout the city.
a_flashband.longDescriptionThree: Since its inception in 2012, Flashband has grown from a few friends using google docs to organize jam sessions to a fully fledged social-media platform. The website helps musicians find and communicate with others in addition to helping them participate in our popular Showcases throughout the city.

b_map.name: Diversity Map
b_map.shortDescription: This map uses the USA Today Diversity Index to show how diversity has surged in the last 50 years and is expected to continue rising.
b_map.longDescription: The USA TODAY 'diversity index' was creating using Census data to calculate the chance that two random people in area are different by race or ethnicity. The scale ranges from 0-100 and has been calculated for counties across the US every year since 1960.
b_map.longDescriptionTwo: The diversity map illustrates the data both by location and chonology.
b_map.longDescriptionThree: his was my first time utilizing the d3.js library and as the sole developer for this project I dove in head first.

c_ghost.name: Ghost Factories
c_ghost.shortDescription: The USA Today Ghost Factories report explores how smelting practices by factories across the US have left the surrounding soil poisoned and dangerous for current populations.

d_elections.name: 2014 Election Interactive
d_elections.shortDescription: Using a variety of infographics and maps, this interactive tracked the progress of the 2014 senate and house elections across the USA.
